columns.name: ALLOW_ITEM_DESC_UPDATE_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if item descriptions can be updated on PO lines.

columns.name: ALLOW_SUBSTITUTE_RECEIPTS_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating if substitute receipts are allowed.

columns.name: ALLOW_UNORDERED_RECEIPTS_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating if unordered receipts are allowed.

columns.name: COST_OF_SALES_ACCOUNT
columns.desc: GL account for cost of sales.

columns.name: COSTING_ENABLED_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating whether costing is enabled for the item.

columns.name: CUSTOMER_ORDER_ENABLED_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if the item is customer orderable.

columns.name: CUSTOMER_ORDER_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if the item is available for customer orders.

columns.name: CYCLE_COUNT_ENABLED_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating if the item is cycle count enabled.

columns.name: DUAL_UOM_CONTROL
columns.desc: Specifies if Dual Unit of Measure control is enabled.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.desc: Item description; note that SEGMENT1 holds the item code.

columns.name: EXPENSE_ACCOUNT
columns.desc: GL account for expense postings.

columns.name: INSPECTION_REQUIRED_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating if inspection is required upon receipt.

columns.name: INTERNAL_ORDER_ENABLED_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if the item is available for internal orders.

columns.name: INTERNAL_ORDER_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag showing if the item can be internally ordered.

columns.name: INVENTORY_ASSET_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating if the item is an inventory asset.

columns.name: INVENTORY_ITEM_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating whether the item is an inventory item.

columns.name: INVENTORY_ITEM_ID
columns.desc: Primary key; unique inventory item identifier (with ORGANIZATION_ID).

columns.name: INVENTORY_ITEM_STATUS_CODE
columns.desc: Item status code indicating material availability status.

columns.name: INVOICE_ENABLED_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if the item can appear on invoices.

columns.name: INVOICEABLE_ITEM_FLAG
columns.desc: Shows if the item can be invoiced.

columns.name: INVOICING_RULE_ID
columns.desc: Identifier for the invoicing rule applicable to the item.

columns.name: ITEM_CATALOG_GROUP_ID
columns.desc: Catalog group the item belongs to.

columns.name: ITEM_TYPE
columns.desc: User-defined item type classification.

columns.name: LIST_PRICE_PER_UNIT
columns.desc: Purchasing list price per unit.

columns.name: LOCATION_CONTROL_CODE
columns.desc: Code indicating if locator control is used.

columns.name: LOT_CONTROL_CODE
columns.desc: Code indicating if lot control is enabled.

columns.name: MARKET_PRICE
columns.desc: Market price used in procurement.

columns.name: MTL_TRANSACTIONS_ENABLED_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating if the item can be transacted in Inventory.

columns.name: MUST_USE_APPROVED_VENDOR_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if the item must be procured only from approved vendors.

columns.name: ORGANIZATION_ID
columns.desc: Primary key; organization identifier (with INVENTORY_ITEM_ID).

columns.name: PRIMARY_UNIT_OF_MEASURE
columns.desc: Primary unit of measure for stocking the item.

columns.name: PRIMARY_UOM_CODE
columns.desc: Unit of measure code for the primary UOM.

columns.name: PROCESS_COSTING_ENABLED_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating process costing is enabled (Oracle Process Mfg).

columns.name: PROCESS_EXECUTION_ENABLED_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating item use in OPM Process Execution.

columns.name: PROCESS_QUALITY_ENABLED_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag for enabling OPM Process Quality usage.

columns.name: PROCESS_SUPPLY_LOCATOR_ID
columns.desc: Default supply locator for process execution.

columns.name: PROCESS_SUPPLY_SUBINVENTORY
columns.desc: Default subinventory for process execution supply transactions.

columns.name: PROCESS_YIELD_LOCATOR_ID
columns.desc: Default yield locator for process execution.

columns.name: PROCESS_YIELD_SUBINVENTORY
columns.desc: Default yield subinventory for process execution.

columns.name: PRODUCT_FAMILY_ITEM_ID
columns.desc: Product family identifier if item belongs to a product family.

columns.name: PURCHASING_ENABLED_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating if the item is purchasable.

columns.name: PURCHASING_ITEM_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating the item is defined as a purchasing item.

columns.name: PURCHASING_TAX_CODE
columns.desc: Purchasing tax code applicable to the item.

columns.name: QTY_RCV_EXCEPTION_CODE
columns.desc: Over-tolerance receipt processing code.

columns.name: QTY_RCV_TOLERANCE
columns.desc: Max acceptable over-receipt percentage tolerance.

columns.name: RECEIPT_DAYS_EXCEPTION_CODE
columns.desc: Code for early/late receipt exception processing.

columns.name: RECEIPT_REQUIRED_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating receipt is required before payment.

columns.name: RECEIVE_CLOSE_TOLERANCE
columns.desc: Tolerance percentage for automatically closing receipts.

columns.name: RECEIVING_ROUTING_ID
columns.desc: Default receiving routing identifier.

columns.name: RECIPE_ENABLED_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if the item can appear on OPM recipes.

columns.name: RESTRICT_LOCATORS_CODE
columns.desc: Restriction code for locators.

columns.name: RESTRICT_SUBINVENTORIES_CODE
columns.desc: Restriction code for subinventories.

columns.name: RFQ_REQUIRED_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if an RFQ is required for the item.

columns.name: SALES_ACCOUNT
columns.desc: Sales account for the item.

columns.name: SECONDARY_UOM_CODE
columns.desc: Secondary Unit of Measure.

columns.name: SERIAL_NUMBER_CONTROL_CODE
columns.desc: Serial number control code.

columns.name: SERIAL_STATUS_ENABLED
columns.desc: Flag indicating serial status is enabled.

columns.name: SHELF_LIFE_CODE
columns.desc: Shelf life control code.

columns.name: SHELF_LIFE_DAYS
columns.desc: Shelf life duration in days.

columns.name: SOURCE_ORGANIZATION_ID
columns.desc: Source organization for default sourcing.

columns.name: SOURCE_SUBINVENTORY
columns.desc: Source subinventory for default sourcing.

columns.name: SOURCE_TYPE
columns.desc: Inventory or supplier source type indicator.

columns.name: STOCK_ENABLED_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating if the item is stockable.

columns.name: SUMMARY_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if the record is a summary (flexfield).

columns.name: TAX_CODE
columns.desc: Tax code assigned to the item.

columns.name: TAXABLE_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating whether the item is taxable.

columns.name: SEGMENT1
columns.desc: Item code (usually used as the key identifier in reporting).

key_columns.name: INVENTORY_ITEM_ID
key_columns.desc: Primary key; unique inventory item identifier (with ORGANIZATION_ID).

key_columns.name: ALLOW_ITEM_DESC_UPDATE_FLAG
key_columns.desc: Indicates if item descriptions can be updated on PO lines.

key_columns.name: ALLOW_SUBSTITUTE_RECEIPTS_FLAG
key_columns.desc: Flag indicating if substitute receipts are allowed.

key_columns.name: ALLOW_UNORDERED_RECEIPTS_FLAG
key_columns.desc: Flag indicating if unordered receipts are allowed.

key_columns.name: COST_OF_SALES_ACCOUNT
key_columns.desc: GL account for cost of sales.

key_columns.name: COSTING_ENABLED_FLAG
key_columns.desc: Flag indicating whether costing is enabled for the item.

key_columns.name: CUSTOMER_ORDER_ENABLED_FLAG
key_columns.desc: Indicates if the item is customer orderable.

key_columns.name: CUSTOMER_ORDER_FLAG
key_columns.desc: Indicates if the item is available for customer orders.

key_columns.name: CYCLE_COUNT_ENABLED_FLAG
key_columns.desc: Flag indicating if the item is cycle count enabled.

key_columns.name: DUAL_UOM_CONTROL
key_columns.desc: Specifies if Dual Unit of Measure control is enabled.

key_columns.name: DESCRIPTION
key_columns.desc: Item description; note that SEGMENT1 holds the item code.

key_columns.name: INSPECTION_REQUIRED_FLAG
key_columns.desc: Flag indicating if inspection is required upon receipt.

notes: MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B defines inventory items, supporting multiple modules like Inventory, Costing, Purchasing, BOM, and Manufacturing. Items are identified by INVENTORY_ITEM_ID and ORGANIZATION_ID, and support multilingual descriptions via MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_TL. The table includes attributes such as primary/secondary UOMs, item types, costing, and inspection flags. Segments are managed via the System Items flexfield (MSTK).
